# Edge Case Links

## Unusual Paths
[Windows Path](C:\Users\test\file.md)
[Unix Path](/usr/local/bin/file)
[URL Encoded Path](%2Fpath%2Fto%2Ffile.md)
[Spaces in Path](./path with spaces/file.md)
